review: Bites the big one. Doesn't work with Netflix on Windows 8.1. Also need to hand over $3.00 to Google to access your youtube account.

review: Great gift for my dad. He loves his chromecast.  Everything the descriptions accurate  and the shipping was fast. Would buy from again.
